primaryPhoto.description:
The National Theatre and Neal Street Productions’ THE LEHMAN TRILOGY makes a triumphant return to London at the Gillian Lynne Theatre following an acclaimed season in Los Angeles and a highly lauded run on Broadway, winning 5 Tony Awards® including Best Play.
Directed by Academy Award®, Tony Award® and Golden Globe winner Sam Mendes, THE LEHMAN TRILOGY features a cast of three playing the Lehman brothers, their sons and grandsons, in an extraordinary feat of story-telling told in three parts on a single evening. Hailed by The New York Times as ‘a genuinely epic production‘, THE LEHMAN TRILOGY is the story of a family and a company that changed the world.
Limited season begins 24 January 2023, at the Gillian Lynne Theatre.
Book your THE LEHMAN TRILOGY theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
